data.eml:eml: The genus Keilbachia Mohrig from Mainland China, with descriptions of two new species (Diptera, Sciaridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Su-Jiong, Huang, Junhao, Wu, Hong, Wang, Yi-ping (2010): The genus Keilbachia Mohrig from Mainland China, with descriptions of two new species (Diptera, Sciaridae). ZooKeys 52: 47-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.52.362, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.52.362
